Reviews.Title: happy w/replacement
Reviews.Author: absent minded
Reviews.Content: cell phone was exactly what I expected....purchased it to replace one I lost (thus I am absent minded).  Quality of used phone was great...just a few minor scratches on the face of the flip phone.  phone EZ to use & I had no trouble activating it w/Verizon.  I am very happy.  Came by USPO VERY QUICKLY.  Thank U!!!

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly
Reviews.Author: Ilana Goldowitz
Reviews.Content: This is a good, solid basic phone and it works well. Came with a charger not recommended for the phone but it still charges up fine. I ordered this preowned phone after my previous phone stopped working and my Verizon plan didn't have an upgrade available. It was easy to activate the phone on my plan at the Verizon store.

Reviews.Title: Works great as a temporary phone.
Reviews.Author: David Medack
Reviews.Content: Phone is pretty basic in operation in comparison to current smart phones, but it performs perfectly as a temporary phone.  It arrived as advertised and in good condition. Good deal!

Reviews.Title: worked good
Reviews.Author: James L. Hungerford "Jim Hungerford"
Reviews.Content: I bought two, one had a deep scratch in it on the front across screen, the other was four star

Reviews.Title: Temporary phone
Reviews.Author: Rodney Walker
Reviews.Content: It serves the purpose as a temporary phone.  It was also a good value for the price.  It saved me from having to buy a $400 phone right now.

Reviews.Title: lg phone
Reviews.Author: gshsh
Reviews.Content: I got this quick and it was in descent shape and works fine so far.it did the job by not having to buy one from verizon and extend my contract with them..

Reviews.Title: A really cool phone that is just a phone!!
Reviews.Author: AU20K
Reviews.Content: If you are a more mature folk (like I should be), this is the perfect phone.It makes and receives phone calls, takes reasonably hi res pix, sends and receives text messages and that is all I want out of the deal.I guess it does more but I don't care.No need for me to have all the smart stuff.The LG VX8360 is a decent quality phone and the speaker is large enough that it sounds good.
